frozen.translation[1].definitions[0].def: frozen food has been stored at a very low temperature in order to preserve it
frozen.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: You can use fresh or frozen fish.
frozen.translation[1].definitions[1].def: earth that is frozen is so cold it has become very hard
frozen.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: The ground is frozen for most of the year.
frozen.translation[1].definitions[2].def: a river, lake etc that is frozen has a layer of ice on the surface
frozen.translation[2].definitions[0].def: frozen food is stored at very low temperatures in order to preserve it
frozen.translation[2].definitions[1].def: frozen assets, accounts etc cannot be used by their owners, for example because there is a legal disagreement concerning them
frozen.translation[2].definitions[1].exa: Tens of thousands of legal claims are being made by companies attempting to have their frozen assets returned.
the estimated $100 million in frozen Cuban accounts in the United States
